overview: Abigail's massage takes an erotic turn when she confesses how much she's longed for the touch of a woman. Despite a string of bad luck keeping them apart, Annika and Bree are determined to share an intimate afternoon together. Karla's fantasies turn to reality when her seductive boss makes an unexpected move. Sara begins to question her sexuality when she finds herself unexpectedly tempted by her new found friend.
title: A Lesbian Romance 2
